caption.title: Historical mean E 0 across the different E 0 formulations.
caption.p: Climatological mean E 0 (mm) across the CONUS for the MJJAS period in GFDL-ESM2M (first three plots in left column) and CanESM2 (right column) as estimated by the Penman-Monteith (first row), Hargreaves-Samani (second row), and Priestley-Taylor (third row) formulations for the 1976â€“2005 period. The bottom left plot shows observed mean MJJAS pan evaporation across the CONUS from 228 stations which had at least 20 years of data between 1950 and 2001.
